sentence.value: He graduated from Bauman Moscow Higher Technical School in 1957 and started working at the Special Design Bureau Number One (which is now RSC Energia) as an engineer, working on the Vostok spacecraft.

sentence.value: In 1966, he was selected for cosmonaut training.
sentence.annotated-sentence: In [[1966|1966]], he was selected for cosmonaut [[training|Training]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: In 1966, he was selected for cosmonaut training.

sentence.value: At first he did work on the Soviet lunar program and was training with Aleksei Leonov for a circumlunar flight.
sentence.annotated-sentence: At first he did work on the Soviet lunar program and was [[training|Training]] with [[Aleksei Leonov|Alexey_Leonov]] for a circumlunar [[flight|Flight]].
